sections.heading: Suspension
sections.text:
ofNRS 326.010to326.070, inclusive, until action by

Legislature.

sections.heading: Commencement
sections.text:
and maintenance of action for interference with possession of public lands

occupied for grazing or agricultural purposes; mining rights.

sections.heading: Size
sections.text: of claim and other conditions necessary to maintain action.

sections.heading: Authorized
sections.text: absence of claimant without occupancy: Payment and disposition of fees.

sections.heading: Proof
sections.text: of actual enclosure not required on trial.

sections.heading: Adverse
sections.text: entrant guilty of unlawful entry; proceedings for removal.

sections.heading: Right
sections.text: to exclusive possession in applicant or contractor.

sections.heading: Right
sections.text: of contractor or applicant to maintain or defend action concerning possession.
